mapper.select: WITH langs AS ( SELECT lang FROM user_language WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) SELECT DISTINCT post_id FROM post_language pl1 WHERE post_id < #{lastId} AND lang IN (SELECT lang FROM langs) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM post_language pl2 WHERE pl2.post_id = pl1.post_id AND pl2.lang not in (SELECT lang FROM langs)) ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 8;
